H0.text: Turin lies on which river. Dora Riparia

H1.text: Turin lies on which river. Tanaro

H2.text: Turin lies on which river. Sesia

H3.text: Turin lies on which river. Po

A4.text: Four major rivers pass through the city: the Po and three of its tributaries, the River Dora Riparia, the Stura di Lanzo and the Sangone.

A5.text: The River Dora Riparia is one of the three tributaries of the Po that pass through Turin.

A6.text: The Po flows through many important Italian cities, including Turin, Piacenza, Cremona and Ferrara.
